name: inane
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
extremely silly or with no real meaning or importance: He's always making inane remarks. There are too many inane quiz shows on television these days. Synonyms
asinine formal
fatuous formal
mindless disapproving
vacuous formal

extremely silly or lacking real meaning or importance: There are so many inane programs on television!
